'''Fruits of the Festival''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Fruits of the Festival can be obtained from [[Charles]] at [[Angel's Share]] for 5,000 [[Mora]].

The recipe for Fruits of the Festival could also be purchased from [[Georg]] during the [[Of Ballads and Brews]] Event.

Depending on the quality, Fruits of the Festival increases all party members' Healing Bonus by '''15'''/'''17'''/'''20'''% for 300s. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
